ability.name: Safeguard
ability.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Altaria by your opponent's Pokémon-ex.

attacks.name: Double Wing Attack
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokémon.

ability.name: Dark Protection
ability.text: Any damage done to Crawdaunt by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 for each Darkness Energy attached to Crawdaunt (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't reduce more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Psychic Removal
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, discard all Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Powerful Hand
attacks.text: Count the number of cards in your hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. You can't put more than 7 damage counters in this way.

attacks.name: Spinning Horn
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rock Hurl
attacks.text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

ability.name: Fast Protection
ability.text: Prevent all effects, including damage, done to Ninjask by your opponent's attacks from his or her Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Swords Dance
attacks.text: During your next turn, Ninjask's Slash attack's base damage is 80.

ability.name: Empty Shell
ability.text: When Shedinja is Knocked Out, your opponent doesn't take any Prize cards.

attacks.name: Extra Curse
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, put 4 damage counters instead.

ability.name: Smooth Over
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a card. Shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of your deck. This power can't be used if Magcargo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Knock Over
attacks.text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

ability.name: Dragon Aura
ability.text: As long as Rayquaza has any basic Fire Energy cards and any basic Lightning Energy cards attached to it, prevent all effects, except damage, by an opponent's attack done to Rayquaza.

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

ability.name: Metallic Lift
ability.text: If Skarmory has any Metal Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Skarmory is 0.

attacks.name: Spearhead
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Heavy Metal
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Skarmory. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Raging Tremble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage for each damage counter on Whiscash to each Defending Pokémon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage for each damage counter on Whiscash to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dwindling Wave
attacks.text: Does 70 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Whiscash.

ability.name: Aqua Lift
ability.text: If Lombre has any Water Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Lombre is 0.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

ability.name: Natural Cure
ability.text: When you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Lombre, remove all Special Conditions from Lombre.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Lombre.

attacks.name: Surprise
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Burning Ball
attacks.text: If Magcargo has at least 2 Fire Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Eerie Light
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: One-Two Strike
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Positive Spark
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

ability.name: Hard Protection
ability.text: Prevent all damage done to Shelgon by attacks from your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Advanced Armor
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Silcoon by your opponent's Evolved Pokémon.

ability.name: Vigorous Aura
ability.text: As long as Vigoroth is your Active Pokémon, attacks by each player's Active Pokémon (both if there are 2) do 10 more damage to any Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Baltoy does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Flip Over
attacks.text: Beldum does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

ability.name: Exoskeleton
ability.text: Any damage done to Corphish by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Double Chop
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Recharge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Electrike. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.name: Mirror Coat
ability.text: If Natu is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent's attack (even if Natu is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now affected by the same Special Conditions (1 if there is only 1).

attacks.name: Razor Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Dense
ability.text: Any damage done to Numel by attacks from Evolved Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Surprise
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Magma Ring
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Gaze
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Surskit during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Taillow during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Self-control
ability.text: Zubat can't be Paralyzed.

cards.name: Crystal Shard
text: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, that Pokémon's type is Colorless. If that Pokémon attacks, discard this card at the end of the turn.
Attach Crystal Shard to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.

cards.name: Energy Charge
text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for 2 Energy cards (1 if there is only 1), show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck.

cards.name: Lady Outing
text: Search your deck for up to 3 different types of basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.

cards.name: Master Ball
text: Look at the top 7 cards from your deck. Choose a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card from those cards, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the other 6 cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Meteor Falls
text: Each player's Active Evolved Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) can use any attack from its Basic Pokémon or its Stage 1 Evolution card. (You still have to pay for that attack's Energy cost.)
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play.

cards.name: Space Center
text: Ignore Poké-Bodies for all Basic Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding Pokémon-ex and Pokémon that has an owner in its name).
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play.

cards.name: Sharpedo ex
text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

attacks.name: Darkness Blast
attacks.text: You may discard a Darkness Energy attached to Sharpedo ex. If you do, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

ability.name: Psychic Trace
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Claydol is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand. This power can't be used if Claydol is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Ancient Mantra
attacks.text: If Claydol has any Psychic Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If Claydol has any Fighting Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Dragon Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Full Retaliation
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on all of your Magikarp.

attacks.name: Pulverize
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has at least 2 damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 50 more damage.

ability.name: Swing Dance
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Healing Steps
attacks.text: You may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, remove that many damage counters from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Circular Steps
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's), excluding Ludicolo.

ability.name: Super Connectivity
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Psychic or Metal Energy card and attach it to your Active Pokémon. Then, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Link Blast
attacks.text: If Metagross and the Defending Pokémon have a different amount of Energy attached to them, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 70.

attacks.name: Seek Out
attacks.text: Search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Pull Away
attacks.text: If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his or her hand, your opponent discards a number of cards until your opponent has 4 cards left in his or her hand.

ability.name: Form Change
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys. (Any cards attached to Deoxys, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Link Blast
attacks.text: If Deoxys and the Defending Pokémon have a different amount of Energy attached to them, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 40.

ability.name: Form Change
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys. (Any cards attached to Deoxys, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Barrier Attack
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Deoxys by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Night Vision
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Sableye is your Active Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. This power can't be used if Sableye is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Limitation
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play any Supporter cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Mirror Coat

attacks.name: Dazzle Dance
attacks.text: Each Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psyloop
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 30 more damage for each Trainer card your opponent has in play.

ability.name: Moonglow
ability.text: The Retreat Cost for each Solrock you have in play is 0.

attacks.name: Foresight
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

attacks.name: Target Beam
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Solrock you have in play.

attacks.name: Sniff Out
attacks.text: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Negative Spark
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Bodies. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

ability.text: As long as Starmie has any Psychic Energy attached to it, damage done to Starmie by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Psychic Boom
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mid-air Crush
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent discards 1 Energy card, if any, attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nosedive
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Swellow does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ascension
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Wurmple and put it on Wurmple. (This counts as evolving Wurmple.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Miracle Essence
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. Each Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

ability.name: Wishing Star
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Jirachi is your Active Pokémon, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. Jirachi and your other Active Pokémon, if any, are now Asleep. This power can't be used if Jirachi is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Metallic Blow
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon has any Poké-Bodies, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Bay Dance
attacks.text: During your next turn, if any of your current Active Pokémon does damage to any Defending Pokémon, the attack does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Aqua Sonic
attacks.text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Triple Breach
attacks.text: Choose 3 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to each of those Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rend
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch. This power can't be used if Nosepass is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

ability.name: Fluff

cards.name: Boost Energy
text: Boost Energy can be attached only to an Evolved Pokémon. Discard Boost Energy at the end of the turn it was attached. Boost Energy provides ColorlessColorlessColorless Energy. The Pokémon Boost Energy is attached to can't retreat. If the Pokémon Boost Energy is attached to isn't an Evolved Pokémon, discard Boost Energy.

cards.name: Scramble Energy

While in play, if you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, Scramble Energy provides every type of Energy but provides only 3 in any combination at a time. If the Pokémon Scramble Energy is attached to isn't an Evolved Pokémon (or evolves into Pokémon-ex), discard Scramble Energy.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Magikarp.

attacks.name: Dig Under
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Double Spin
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Slakoth.

attacks.name: Rapid Spin
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any. You switch Staryu with 1 of your Benched Pokémon, if any.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
